alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Salt Lake and southeastern Davis Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salt Lake City International Airport, or 8 miles northwest of West Valley City, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Bountiful, Farmington, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, Salt Lake City International Airport and Antelope Island State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 313 and 322. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 107 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
